p: The test was repeated for an exposure period of 4 h using 3 additional animals to confirm the initial findings. The animals were examined at 1, 24, and 48 and 72 h for signs of erythema and oedema according to standard score system ( TablesÂ 1 and 2), after removal of patches animals were kept under the observation for 14 days to determine the reversibility of effects.
